title: ADB $24.2 Million Grant to Help Build PNG’s Resilience to Climate Change (ADB - Asian ...
text: ( Source : ADB - Asian Development Bank ) BOUGAINVILLE, PAPUA NEW GUINEA - The Asian Development Bank (ADB) is providing a $24.25 million grant to help Papua New Guinea ( PNG ) build up its resilience and responsiveness to the impacts of climate
